title: My Pixel 4a 5g keeps changing the default ringtone back to "1023." Help.
content: I've tried other stock sounds, Zedge ringtones, and custom ringtones. They last for a while - less than the day - but later in the day the weird ringtone is back, and Settings | Sounds | Advanced | Phone Ringtone reveals the "1023" is back in place.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
